module.name: Camp-On
module.changelog: *2.11.0.3* Update license file *2.11.0.1* #6876 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.2* #5705, #5710 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.0* spelling, cosmetics *2.9.0beta1.0* #778 Camp-On implenentation using CCSS, beta release requires Asterisk patch 18788 for full functionality
module.description: This module implements the Call Completion Supplemental Services (CCSS) often referred to as Call Camping or Camp-On. It allows a caller to request the system call them back when a busy or non-responding extension becomes available. Requires Asterisk 1.8 or higher.
